titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sons of the American Revolution, Gen. William Floyd Chapter records 1978.057
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-12-28 18:35:40 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Sons of the American Revolution, Gen. William Floyd Chapter records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Sons of the American Revolution. Gen. William Floyd Chapter

did.abstract: These records include memos, fliers, membership lists, and correspondence of the Gen. William Floyd Chapter of the Sons of the American Revolution, based in the New York City area.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The papers were formally accessioned in 1978.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Sons of the American Revolution, Gen. William Floyd Chapter records, 1978.057, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records span the period 1959 to 1969. They include memos, fliers, membership lists, and correspondence of the Gen. William Floyd Chapter of the Sons of the American Revolution, based in the New York City area.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
